pageProduct.name: Thompsons Ashwagandha Complex Night 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Ashwagandha Complex Night is traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to help the body to adapt to stress and support healthy sleeping patterns.

The Ashwagandha Complex Night is traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to:
- reduce disturbed sleep
- reduce nervous tension
- reduce sleeplessness
It contains three herbal ingredients: Ashwagandha, Passionflower and Lavender oil. Ashwagandha is traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to help the body adapt to stress and Passionflower and lavender oil are traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to support healthy sleeping patterns.

Suitable For: Vegetarian/vegan friendly.

Size: 60 Tablets

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Ashwagandha is traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to help the body adapt to stress
• Passionflower and lavender oil are traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to support healthy sleeping patterns.
• Reduce nervous tension

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.
Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Active ingredients per tablet:
Lavender oil 20mg.
Passiflora incarnata (Passionflower) ext. 150mg
derived from dry herb (flowering and fruiting) 750mg.
Withania somnifera (Ashwagandha) ext. 150mg.
derived from dry root 1.5g (1500mg).
std. to contain withanolides 3.75mg.

Allergen Free From: Added Sugar| Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Dairy| Egg| Fish| Gluten| Lactose| Nuts| Sesame Seeds| Soy| Sugar

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap and recycle glass.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
